column4: and pork sausage with queso and a side of elote. They definitely go heavy on the seasoning and there's no need for sauce. Brisket was tender
column5: pork ribs were soft and flavorful
column6: and both improved with the unconventional addition of queso and some of their pickled onions. I thought the sausages were alright
column7: but the brisket was definitely my favorite. I found the prices pretty reasonable for Texas BBQ
column8: and if I was nearby I wouldn't think twice about stopping by to scratch an itch for brisket. Also
